about_the_game:
BPM Boy is a physics-based platformer, with influences from games like Marble Madness, Super Monkey Ball, deBlob and Crystal Castles. Your rival, DJ GitBizy, has stolen your music and imprisoned your fans! Jump from funky planet to funky planet, collecting notes, platforming, light puzzle-solving and rescuing your fans!

BPM Boy features multiple routes, hidden secrets, physics-based platforming, leaderboards for speed-runners and an original soundtrack driven by RetroNinja's Dynamic Music & Sound Regulator (DMSR), where funky grooves change, as you save the music throughout the galaxy.
